title: Reasons for quitting health club membership 2014
summary: The statistic shows the Reasons used libraries , quitting and tools health software club membership , as of early 2014 .
According to the survey , 40 percentage of respondents used It_was_too_expensive_/_I_could_not_afford_it , while 30 percentage used I_wasn't_using_my_membership_/_wasn't_going .
The least used framework was Other with only 1 percentage of respondents reporting .

data.Response: It was too expensive / I could not afford it
I wasn't using my membership / wasn't going
I moved / the location was no longer convenient
I could exercise somewhere else for free
I developed an injury / surgery / other condition
I did not like to exercise
I didn't reach my fitness goals
There was no one there to guide me
I didn't know what to do there
I wanted to participate in another type of exercise
Nobody I knew went to my former health club
